name: Bogdan Avram
personal:
I am a software development professional with over 5 years of experience in designing, implementing and testing software solutions.

My area of expertise includes developing solutions for business domains such as telecom solutions, sensor data gathering and aggregation, ERP, and educational tools.

From a technical perspective my experience is focused on Python language, technologies and frameworks, mostly from a back-end perspective.

description:
Responsibilities:
•	Develop the microservices that were necessary for the system, create and update the database structure using Alembic and performing manual tests to ensure that they work on the client’s development environment.
•	Created REST API using Django and Django Rest Framework and Flask
•	Established CI/CD pipeline using GitHub and CircleCI
•	Developed Python package using Flask/Django
•	Implemented Unit Testing for multiple Python projects
•	Managed and set up Linux servers


Technologies: Python, PostgreSQL, Docker, Ansible, RESTful API, Linux, Network tunneling.

Languages & Databases:
Python – 3.5 years
Java – 6 months
MySQL – 3 years
PostgreSQL – 3 years
Bash – 2 years
MongoDb - 2 years


Tools:
PyCharm – 3 years
Visual Studio Code – 4 years
Git – 2 years
Docker – 2 years
Flask – 3 years
Jenkins – 2 years
Linux – 3 years
Stop Light Studio – 4 months
Restful API – 2 years
Ansible – 2 years
Alembic – 4 months
Eclipse – 1 year
Django – 2 years


Techniques & Methods:	Agile (Scrum) – 2 years


Technical skills: 
Software design, Software development, Testing
experience.headline: Software Developer

description:
Experienced in writing and testing code, debugging programs and integrating applications with third-party web services. Specialized in programming and development of a variety of applications (program scripting, big data manipulation, web servers). 

Projects description: 
-	Implement CRM/Sales/HR module with basic and special operations
-	Game statistics: using modules, conforming to test requirements, filtering data, working with external files, handling errors.
-	Password checker project: I’ve used Python with Visual Studio Code, hashlib, request library.
-	Strong experience in integrating user-facing elements into applications, writing effective, clean code and developing back-end components to improve responsiveness and overall performance.


Tools: Python (Pandas, pygame, numpy, sklearn), CSS, HTML, JavaScript, Python web framework (Django, Flask)
Text editors: Visual Studio Code, Jupyter Notebook, Sublime text, Atom.
IDE: Pycharm
experience.headline: Python developer
